cu.explanation_en: Setting the local SCTP port C to an out-of-range value of 99999 will cause port binding failures and prevent SCTP connection establishment.

du.explanation_en: Setting the number of uplink slots to an invalid value of 20 will exceed the maximum allowed slots for the TDD pattern and cause scheduling failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將上行時隙數設定為無效的值 20，將超過 TDD 模式允許的最大時隙數，並導致調度失敗。
